page.title: 16SENIOR CITIZENS
page.content: WE MET FOUR OF THE RETIRED PEOPLE IN THE VILLAGE. ONE SPENT HOURS WORKING IN HER DELIGHTFUL GARDEN, ENCOURAGING BOTH CULTIVATED & WILD FLOWERS. THE VIEW AROUND HER COTTAGE IS BOTH PEACEFUL & AWE-INSPIRING. DRIVES HER OWN CAR. NEXT WE MET A GENTLEMAN WHO ENJOYED LIFE ENORMOUSLY. HAD NO SPARE TIME. DID NOT KNOW HOW HE EVER FOUND TIME TO WORK. NO CAR, USED TWICE WEEKLY BUS SERVICE. FINALLY WE MET ELDERLY TWIN SISTERS. OWING TO RHEUMATISM, DEAFNESS & THE EFFECTS OF LONELINESS ( SOMETIMES NOT SPEAKING TO ANYONE FOR 2 or 3 days) COULD NOT LEAVE THE VILLAGE. ALL SHOPPING DONE FROM VILLAGE SHOP. THEY ENJOYED THEIR 'WILD' GARDEN, BOOKS FROM LIBRARY VAN & TELEVISION. THE VILLAGE IS AN OASIS OF PEACE & BEAUTY. FOR SOME IT COULD BE A PRISON.
